mapper.select: select room.chatRoomNum from dk_chat_room room INNER JOIN dk_chat_member member ON room.chatRoomNum = member.chatRoomNum where room.roomownerid = #{roomOwnerId} and member.chat_memberId = #{chat_memberId} and room.chat_type = 0

select /*+INDEX_ASC(dk_chat_content pk_chat_content) */ chat_writerId , chat_writerNick , chat_content , content_type , regdate from dk_chat_content where chatRoomNum = #{chatRoomNum} and chatContentNum > 0
select chat_memberId, chat_memberNick from dk_chat_member where chatRoomNum = #{chatRoomNum} and chat_memberId != #{userId}
